name: Q4 Sales Outreach
description: End-of-year sales campaign targeting enterprise clients

emailSequence.subject: Quick question about {{company}}'s Q4 planning
emailSequence.body:
Hi {{firstName}},

I noticed {{company}} has been growing rapidly this year. Are you planning any major initiatives for Q4?

I'd love to share how we've helped similar companies scale their operations.

Best regards,
Sales Team

variants.name: Variant A - Direct
variants.subject: Quick question about {{company}}'s Q4 planning
variants.body:
Hi {{firstName}},

I noticed {{company}} has been growing rapidly this year. Are you planning any major initiatives for Q4?

I'd love to share how we've helped similar companies scale their operations.

Best regards,
Sales Team

variants.name: Variant B - Curiosity
variants.subject: {{company}}'s growth caught our attention
variants.body:
Hi {{firstName}},

Your company's impressive growth this year hasn't gone unnoticed. We've been following {{company}}'s journey and are curious about your Q4 strategy.

Would you be open to a brief conversation about how we've helped similar fast-growing companies?

Best regards,
Sales Team

emailSequence.subject: Following up on {{company}}'s Q4 plans
emailSequence.body:
Hi {{firstName}},

I wanted to follow up on my previous message about Q4 planning.

Would you be interested in a quick 15-minute call to discuss how we can help {{company}} achieve its goals?

Best,
Sales Team

name: Product Demo Campaign
description: Showcasing our new product features to potential customers

emailSequence.subject: See our new features in action
emailSequence.body:
Hi {{firstName}},

We've just launched some exciting new features that I think {{company}} would find valuable.

Would you like to see a quick demo?

Best,
Product Team

variants.name: Variant A - Features
variants.subject: See our new features in action
variants.body:
Hi {{firstName}},

We've just launched some exciting new features that I think {{company}} would find valuable.

Would you like to see a quick demo?

Best,
Product Team

variants.name: Variant B - Benefits
variants.subject: New ways to boost {{company}}'s productivity
variants.body:
Hi {{firstName}},

Our latest product updates could significantly improve {{company}}'s workflow efficiency.

Interested in seeing how these improvements could benefit your team?

Best,
Product Team

variants.name: Variant C - Urgency
variants.subject: Limited time: Early access to new features
variants.body:
Hi {{firstName}},

We're offering select companies early access to our game-changing new features.

{{company}} qualifies for this exclusive preview. Interested?

Best,
Product Team

Hi {{firstName}},

The holidays are here and we're offering a special discount just for {{company}}!

emailSequence.subject: Last chance: Holiday offer expires soon
emailSequence.body:
Hi {{firstName}},

Just a friendly reminder that our holiday offer expires in 3 days.

Don't miss out on 30% off - this is our biggest discount of the year!

Ready to get started?

Best,
Marketing Team

name: New Year Follow-up
description: Following up with prospects after the holidays

emailSequence.subject: Happy New Year! Let's discuss {{company}}'s 2024 goals
emailSequence.body:
Hi {{firstName}},

Happy New Year! I hope you had a wonderful holiday season.

As we start 2024, I'd love to learn about {{company}}'s priorities for the year.

Would you be open to a brief conversation?

Best wishes,
Sales Team
